TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FontNamesConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 在包含字体名称列表的字符串和表示个别名称的字符串数组之间进行转换。

span.span: Converts between a string containing a list of font names and an array of strings representing the individual names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 此类的方法将包含字体名称列表的单个字符串转换为包含单个名称的字符串数组。Use the method of this class to convert a single string containing a list of font names to an array of strings containing the individual names. 字符串中的每个字体名称必须用逗号分隔。Each font name in the string must be separated by a comma. 例如，字符串 "arial，new 罗马，verdana，verdana"，将转换为包含字符串 "arial"、"new roman" 和 "verdana" 的数组。For example, the string "arial, times new roman, verdana", converts to an array that contains the strings "arial", "times new roman", and "verdana". 请注意，逗号将与字体名称开头或结尾处的任何空白一起删除。Notice the commas are removed along with any white space at the beginning or end of the font name. 不会删除字体名称中间的空白。White space in the middle of a font name is not removed. 方法执行反向运算。The method performs the reverse operation. 它将包含个别字体名称的字符串数组转换为包含名称列表的单个字符串。It converts an array of strings containing the individual font names to a single string containing a list of the names. 例如，包含字符串 "arial"、"new roman" 和 "verdana" 的数组将转换为字符串 "arial，new 罗马，verdana，verdana"。For example, an array that contains the strings "arial", "times new roman", and "verdana" converts to the string "arial,times new roman,verdana". 请注意，在字体名称之间自动插入逗号，而不包含任何空格。Notice that commas are automatically inserted between the font names without any white space. 调用 方法以验证是否可以在调用方法之前进行转换 。Call the method to verify that the conversion can be made before calling the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类将包含字体名称列表的字符串转换为包含单个名称的字符串数组。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to convert a string with a list of font names to an array of strings containing the individual names. 然后，将字符串数组转换回单个字符串并显示出来。The array of strings is then converted back to a single string and displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: How to: Implement a Type Converter
Type Converter Sample

remarks.format: ## Remarks 永远不应直接访问类型转换器。You should never access a type converter directly. 而应使用对象调用适当的转换器 。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a object. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例 。For more information, see the examples in .

summary.span: 确定此转换器是否可以将指定数据类型的对象转换为包含个别字体名称的字符串数组。

span.span: Determines whether this converter can convert an object of the specified data type to an array of strings containing individual font names.

returns.span: 如果可以转换类型，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the type can be converted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可确定指定的数据类型是否可转换为包含单个字体名称的字符串数组。Use the method to determine whether the specified data type can be converted to an array of strings containing individual font names. > [!NOTE] > 此转换器只能从 `string` 数据类型转换。This converter can convert only from a `string` data type. `sourceType`参数的类型必须为 。The `sourceType` parameter must be of type . 否则，此方法 `false` 将返回以指示无法转换指定的数据类型。Otherwise, this method returns `false` to indicate that the specified data type cannot be converted. 您可以选择性地传入 `null` `context` 参数。You can optionally pass in `null` for the `context` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 此示例在执行转换之前，确定指定的数据类型是否可以转换为包含单个字体名称的字符串数组。The example determines whether the specified data type can be converted to an array of strings that contains the individual font names before performing the conversion. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可将包含字体名称列表的字符串转换为包含单个名称的字符串数组。Use the method to convert a string containing a list of font names to an array of strings containing the individual names. 字符串中的每个字体名称必须用逗号分隔。Each font name in the string must be separated by a comma. 例如，字符串 "arial，new 罗马，verdana，verdana"，将转换为包含字符串 "arial"、"new roman" 和 "verdana" 的数组。For example, the string "arial, times new roman, verdana", converts to an array that contains the strings "arial", "times new roman", and "verdana". 请注意，逗号将与字体名称开头或结尾处的任何空白一起删除。Notice that the commas are removed along with any white space at the beginning or end of the font name. 不会删除字体名称中间的空白。White space in the middle of a font name is not removed. > [!NOTE] > `context` `culture` 此版本的方法中不使用和参数，它们是为该方法的未来版本保留的。The `context` and `culture` parameters are not used in this version of the method; they are reserved for future versions of the method. 可以选择 `null` 为这些参数传入。You can optionally pass in `null` for these parameters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法将包含字体名称列表的字符串转换为包含单个名称的字符串数组。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to convert a string with a list of font names to an array of strings containing the individual names. span.span: A instance that represents a string containing a list of font names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可将包含个别字体名称的字符串数组转换为包含名称列表的单个字符串。Use the method to convert an array of strings containing the individual font names to a single string containing a list of the names. 例如，包含字符串 "arial"、"new roman" 和 "verdana" 的数组将转换为字符串 "arial，new 罗马，verdana，verdana"。For example, an array that contains the strings "arial", "times new roman", and "verdana" converts to the string "arial,times new roman,verdana". 请注意，在字体名称之间自动插入逗号，而不包含任何空格。Notice that commas are automatically inserted between the font names without any white space. > [!NOTE] > 此转换器只能转换为 `string` 数据类型。This converter can convert only to a `string` data type. `destinationType`参数的类型必须为 。The `destinationType` parameter must be of type . > [!NOTE] > `context` `culture` 此版本的方法中不使用和参数，它们是为该方法的未来版本保留的。The `context` and `culture` parameters are not used in this version of the method; they are reserved for future versions of the method. 可以选择 `null` 为这些参数传入。You can optionally pass in `null` for these parameters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法将包含单个名称的字符串数组转换为包含字体名称列表的单个字符串。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to convert an array of strings containing the individual names to a single string that contains a list of font names.
